page.title: 02A Typical Day in my Life.
page.content: My name is{Eleanor Lewis.}I am 11 years of age and attend{Pontrhydyfen {Primary School.}On a week day my father rises about 7.00am and lays the table. At about 8.00am I get up and go down to breakfast. I usually have orange juice, cornflakes, toast and a cup of coffee. Then I go and get changed and brush my teeth. At about 8.35am a class mate's father comes and picks me and my sister up for school. Once at school we have assembly at 9.05am and at 9.25am we start work, which is usually mathematics. We have a break at 10.30am which lasts for 15 minutes. When we come back in we have English. At 12.00 we have lunch;I take sandwiches. School re-commences at 1.10pm.We either finish off work from the morning or do general work such as,History,Science,Geography Scripture
